titleInfo.title: Letter from G I Holborn, 1 Upper Berkeley Street, London to General Sir Lewis Pelly, KCB

mods.abstract: Letter discussing Pelly's wishes to have portraits of himself and his fianc√©e Amy Henrietta Lowder made for their engagement announcements, which would include an image of Amy's stepfather Sir Rutherford Alcock, and detailing various prices and options.
